overview: Directors Mick Blue and Maestro Claudio - the stud/director and master cinematographer at BAM Visions - deliver a mouth-watering medley of sultry workout sluts that love showing off their fit bodies and expert anal aptitude. "Ass Workout" spotlights steamy POV blow jobs and hot anal aerobics in a regimen of fitness-inspired sexual trysts with award-winning pornographer Mick serving as personal trainer.
title: Ass Workout
